entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `--create-manifest-if-needed` should be mentioned if no manifest exists #39329
  • NullReferenceException in Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks.ProjectContext after broken restore #39316

Closed

  • Add a template for the Directory.Packages.props file #39341
  • When run a dotnet background service as a unix service is always show "Error: No space left on device" #33899
  • dotnet build and workload stops working after updating, Roslyn: Unhandled Exception: System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary #39033

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39347
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #39327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Add -pr version of pipeline #39324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enhance base image inference for trimmed applications - use -extras when globalization is in use #39317
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [main] Add -pr version of pipeline #39322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add -pr version of pipeline #39323
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary RemoveMSDiaTypeLib target from GenerateLayout.targets #39304
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry pick extensions fix #39306
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update TestAsTool builds to use 1ES pools #39308
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Make sure package search exits with 1 or 0 in the SDK side #39301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable publishing in VMR #39311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Write the full path of the dotnet tools directory in /etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools #35411
    untriaged, Area-Tools
